description: Primes of the form p*2^k+1, where p is an odd prime and k>0.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..2000
example: 719 is here because 718=2*359 and 359 is prime.
crossrefs: Cf. A074781 (this sequence and the Fermat primes), A147545
author: _Labos Elemer_, Dec 20 2000
extensions: Revised definition from T. D. Noe, Nov 03 2008
